TopicTitle: How do you import a craft file into sketchfab

Articles.Content:
Not exactly a game question, but I want to have a 3d model of the craft in a thread of mine. (The ones you usually see in the spacecraft exchange)

Yes I know that .craft files are just textual descriptions and that .mu files cannot be reversed engineered.
that issue with the fuel line in the finished product of the example fixed or is that still an problem?

Still a problem. It's a symptom of multi-point connections on Struts and Fuel Lines. The game is tricking itself to display them correctly, but what you see in that finished product is more accurate to the way the computer views it logically.

Multipoint connections are not actually a thing, it's supposed to be that any part can only attach itself it one other part. Squad had to creatively hack them in.

Edited November 3, 2015 by Alshain
